targets.query: from(bucket: "sensors") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "htu21" and r._field == "temperature_c")
from(bucket: "sensors") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "htu21" and r._field == "humidity_percent")
